To create a portable distribution of that you can keep on an USB stick, follow these instruction:
Go to http://www.oxygenxml.com/download_oxygenxml_editor.html?os=MacOSX and download the MAC distribution;The MAC distribution does not include Java Virtual Machine.
Unpack the ZIP and copy the license.txt file to the unpacked directory;
Use to start the application. Java will be installed automatically unless it ia already installed.
